product_name: Clif Shot Electrolyte Hydration Drink Mix - Single Serving
long_description: Clif Shot Electrolyte Hydration Drink Mix delivers the performance nutrition your body needs when training and racing. Organic glucose and dried cane syrup provide clean hydration and muscle recovery. Refreshing blends of lemon/lime or cranberry/raspberry help prevent drastic energy drops and cramping. With 4% carbohydrates and all 5 electrolytes, Clif Shot Electrolyte Hydration Drink Mix helps your body absorb and retain fluid for effective hydration. Makes 16 fl. oz. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Clif Shot Electrolyte Hydration Drink Mix delivers the performance nutrition your body needs when training and racing. Organic glucose and dried cane syrup provide clean hydration and muscle recovery.
